features: Waterproof Playing Cards: 63mm x 88mm size. Premium 100% plastic playing cards. 2-pip 'poker cards' style. Will not easily rip or crease. The perfect poker gift but great for the hot tub!
Easy to Handle: Don't crack or crease when shuffled or flexed. Each pack of poker cards is perfect for Texas Holdem or any other poker card game. Never go back to a paper deck of playing cards again.
They Glide! The smooth underside allows them to glide across the table, whilst the backs are slightly textured for easy handling and shuffling. Casino playing cards - Great as poker gifts.
Jumbo Index: So you can easily see which card is which from across the table. This really helps as community cards can be a few feet away. Perfect for a casino night or as gambling gifts!

Long-lasting: Last up to 50 times longer than regular paper poker playing cards. 52 playing cards, 2 jokers, 1 cutting card, 1 discount card. Also great for other games like blackjack, canasta and whist.
description: Product Description A premium deck of Texas Hold'em playing cards from Poker Night Pro is essential for a great night with your friends. Our professional casino-quality cards are 100% plastic , completely waterproof and will last up to 50 times longer than normal paper cards. They can be bent and flexed and will return to their original shape every time. Smooth on the faces, they will glide across the felt but have a very fine texture on the backs to help with shuffling and dealing. With a 'jumbo' index and '2-pip' style they can easily be read from across the table and at any angle. Each deck comes with the usual 52 cards - 13 of each suit plus 2 jokers - as well as a special thank you card from us toward your next purchase. Professional Cards 54 Cards per Deck 2 Jokers Included Jumbo Index Poker Size 100% Plastic Casino Quality 2-Pip Style Extremely Durable Smooth Faces Textured Backs Completely Waterproof
